ValueEntry.Name: Reflective Alloy Furnace
ValueEntry.Description: Creates an alloy perfect for the mirror finish necessary for both optimum lenses and for heat reflection.

ValueEntry.Name: Turbomotor Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Turbocharges motors for use in heavy machinery.

ValueEntry.Name: Pipe Reinforcer
ValueEntry.Description: Wraps a crystal fiber mesh around molybdenum piping with iron reinforcements. A very sturdy pipe capable of withstanding great pressures and temperatures.

ValueEntry.Name: Hiemal Experimental Pod Assembler
ValueEntry.Description: Combines endgame materials for the ultimate research pod...slowly.
